description.value:
A witch using this hex calls down the forces of nature to wreak havoc on an area. This functions as a @Compendium[pf1.spells.n4e35m6qu9nmkhgm]{Storm Of Vengeance} combined with an @Compendium[pf1.spells.a5gcbpwfhu4hh5ic]{Earthquake} that occurs on the second round of the effect (while acid is raining from the sky). A witch must concentrate for the duration of this effect. If disrupted, the effect immediately ends.

A witch can only use this ability once per day.
